subject: Dearest
body:
Dearest 
.in christ,
Please kindly be honest to me. My Name is pastor. jonathan good man  I am a dying man who had decided to donate what I have to the Charities. I am 60 years old and was diagnosed for cancer about four years ago,immediately after the death of my wife.
I have been touched to donate from what I have inherited from my late wife for the good work rather than allow his relatives to lavish my wife hard earned fund. As I lay on my sick bed, I want you to help me in carrying out my last wish on earth which will also be very profitable to you. I want to WILL a total sum of $ 4Million USD to you which I want you to distribute part of it to any charity home for me and the rest for yourself and your family, I will inform you on how to share all.
However i left the funds with a security company,please get back to me so that i can tell you,How to claim it from them.
Please for further information contact me ASAP.
contact E-Mail. 
jonathangoodman35@yahoo.com
I will be looking forward to hear from you.
Regards.
PASTOR JONATHAN GOOD MAN..
(1)Your direct phone number...........................
(2) Your complete address ............................
(3) Your full name......................................
(4) Your occupation and age..............................

subject: Re:   Dearest
body:
Hello Pastor Jonathan Good Man,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in wanting me to help carry out your last wish on earth. Could you please provide more details about how we can proceed with distributing the funds to charity homes and how I can claim the funds from the security?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Urgent read very well and contact the company immediately (MR HAROLD)
body:
Dear Mr. Harold in christ,
How are you doing,i can see that you are a honest person,i now know that if i Die you will help me handle my money very well according to my instructions.But today my sickness is more serious now.The doctor say i will be going in for an operations now, But if you hear that am Dead,i will pass a message to you on how you will distribute my money for me.Please pray for me.

Now read this email below and do according to my instructions.
All you have to do now  is to contact the  DSP COURIER SHIPPING COMPANY SERVICES ,enquire from them if my two consignments deposited with them is still  pending and safe with them.For safety purpose I did not disclose to them that it is money in  their care. I packaged this money in two gold plated  boxes as consignment. Bear it in mind that the DSP COURIER SHIPPING COMPANY SERVICES does not know the content of the consignment because I registered it as (Gold bars ) and not money.Please get back to me as soon as you contact them so that i can no what is going on.Below is the email address of the company contact them now.God bless you amen. SEE ATTACHMENT TO SEE MY PICTURE
WAIT YOUR IMMEDIATE RESPOND TO AVOID DELAY ON IT. DSP COURIER SHIPPING COMPANY SERVICESDIRECTORMR PAUL MORGANdspshipping52@gmail.comPHONE:+2348146447567

subject: Re: Urgent read very well and contact the company immediately (MR HAROLD)
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope you are doing well. I am sorry to hear about your health situation and I wish you a successful operation and a speedy recovery.

Regarding the email you shared, it seems like you want me to contact the DSP Courier Shipping Company Services to inquire about two deposited items that are supposedly in their care. It's important to handle such matters carefully and ensure everything is done securely.

Could you provide more details about how you would like me to proceed with contacting the company? I want to make sure I understand your instructions clearly before taking any action. Thank you for sharing this information with me.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: Urgent read very well and contact the company immediately (MR HAROLD)
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope you are doing well despite your health condition. I understand that you want me to contact the DSP Courier Shipping Company Services regarding your deposited items. Could you provide me with more details about how you would like me to proceed with this matter? Feel free to share any additional information so that I can assist you accordingly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: Re: Urgent read very well and contact the company immediately (MR HAROLD)
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,

I hope you are doing well. I understand that you are facing some health challenges and need assistance with handling your money. It's important to take care of such matters, especially during difficult times.

Could you please provide more details about the email you mentioned? What exactly do they want you to do regarding contacting the DSP COURIER SHIPPING COMPANY SERVICES? It's essential to have a clear understanding before taking any further steps.

Feel free to share more information so that I can better assist you in this situation.

Best wishes,
Harold

subject: tcontact the company immediately (MR HAROLD)
body:
Hello Mr. Harold,
Sorry i do not have to tell,Than what i have told you.Go head and contact the shipping company,And stop delaying and asking me too much questions.
Best wishes,Harold
